package.name: cross-zlib-amd64
package.build:
exit 0
export PATH=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-musl/x86_64-linux-musl/bin:/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-musl/bin:$PATH export CC=x86_64-linux-musl-gcc cd zlib-${PKGVERSION} ./configure --shared make
package.install:
mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/etc/lesslinux touch ${TGTDIR}/etc/lesslinux/${PKGNAME}-${PKGVERSION}-dummy exit 0
cd zlib-${PKGVERSION} export PATH=/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-musl/x86_64-linux-musl/bin:/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-musl/bin:$PATH export CC=x86_64-linux-musl-gcc make prefix=${TGTDIR}/usr/local/crosstools-amd64-musl/x86_64-linux-musl install
